title: re-val
content:
i got a total of 73 in phy , 75 in EEE and 64 in mechanics got a B grade in all   
is there any  chance to inc a grade as i hv a feeling that above 75 us A grade (relative grading)

comments.body: How did you get to know the marks of individual subjects for ESA?
Apply for reval. There is no other way to know.
You got B grade in Mechanical at 64? Shouldn't it be at 70?
Don't put mechanical obviously. But the other two might work
do u by any chance know the grading system
do u by any chance know the grading system
No way to know, since it is applied independently to each course. B grade for mech is valid, but the others probably not. Apply for re-eval and see, it might improve your grade.
This is your total score out of 100 (ISA+ESA+assignment) combined right? Not just the ESA total right?
So did you pay 100 rupees for it or how?
Has the Grade increased in Revaluation do you know any case I think it won't they will find ways to cut marks and keep the grade same so that they prove they have a Very Good evaluation System.
